Merge pull request #22 from codegangsta/Merovius-wait

Fixing Zombie processes from builder.go
Simplified the builder command

Removed the Wait() in runner.go

We don't need to wait in runner.go since Runner makes sure that the
server process is killed before spawning a new one. The issue with
zombie processed had to do with the go build command not being waited
upon

Wait() for forked processes

gin does not call Wait() on the started processes, effectively creating
zombies everytime it builds or restarts the app. This rectifies that.

Merge pull request #7 from JamesClonk/windows_exe_extension

Added ".exe" extension to binary file on Windows

Kill process before rebuild

If the process is not killed before the rebuild starts, it will fail on
Windows as the "bin" file is still running, thus open & locked.

Added ".exe" extension to binary file on Windows

Running a binary on Windows does not work if it does not have the ".exe"
extension. No joke!
